website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Miix 2 (10-inch) is an entry-level, detachable-hybrid Windows tablet that features a high-definition, In-Plane Switching (IPS) screen, a magnetic keyboard dock, and robust audio.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, good response
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great tablet, good response, good resolution, light, solid keyboard, good amount of connection option, great price for what you get. Cons: connection by magnets-not attached, angle not adjustable when using keyboard. Would give it 5 stars if the connection was more solid and the viewing angle was adjustable. But overall, for the price, I can't complain.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! If you are buying it to strictly use as a tablet, then it is fine. If you are buying it for the attached key board, save your money! Had it out the box within 2 hours of getting it. Setup is very easy, especially if you have other computers running Windows, however the attached key board is terrible. Hard to get it to connect and once you do the keys are temperamental.

product_meta.title: Lenovo Miix 2 10.1-Inch 64 GB Tablet (59427304) Silver Grey
product_meta.description:
The 10.1" Lenovo Miix 2 provides on-the-go productivity in Laptop Mode, comfortable viewing in Stand Mode and handy entertainment with Tablet Mode. The detachable AccuType Keyboard dock makes switching modes seamless, while premium speakers and audio-enhancement technologies ensure top-quality sound.
